ygData.subject: Re: Shadow Star
ygData.msgSnippet: Kyle, just calm down for a little while.  As for you, LN, you need to start posting something other than what he can or cannot do.  Because, quite frankly, you

Kyle, just calm down for a little while.  As for you, LN, you need to start 
posting something other than what he can or cannot do.  Because, quite 
frankly, you had to post where he went, if you posted something like "he 
disappeared into the woods," or some such thing, then it's perfectly legal to 
"stumble" upon him.  The only way to avoid that would be if he left the 
planet.

--part1_a3.21073b9d.295793be_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>Kyle, just calm down for a little while.  As for you, LN, you need to start posting something other than what he can or cannot do.  Because, quite frankly, you had to post where he went, if you posted something like "he disappeared into the woods," or some such thing, then it's perfectly legal to "stumble" upon him.  The only way to avoid that would be if he left the planet.</FONT></HTML>

--part1_a3.21073b9d.295793be_boundary--
